Name: AfterMapObjDrawAir
Notes: Decorative atmosphere that is meant to be placed around a planet or section. Unlike other Air objects, this gets executed and rendered after most other objects.

Obj_arg1.Name: Hide during Intro?
Obj_arg1.Description: The air won't appear during the intro if enabled.

SW_B.Description: Disappears if activated, reappears if deactivated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: Appears if 消滅 action gets triggered.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
